wf_workflow_version.name: Daily Expenses Workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

wf_activity.name: Change state to claim about to release

sys_variable_value.value: state=7^comments=Your claim is under processing, you will receive payment soon.^EQ
state=7^comments=Your claim is under processing, you will receive payment soon.^EQ

activity.display_value: Change state to claim about to release

sys_variable_value.value: state=8^comments=Your payment has released. please check your account.^EQ
state=8^comments=Your payment has released. please check your account.^EQ
state=4^comments=Please check your monthly expenses sheet and re-submit it, by providing proper proofs for claim.^EQ
state=4^comments=Please check your monthly expenses sheet and re-submit it, by providing proper proofs for claim.^EQ
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Monthly Expenses Approved by Finance Team
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Hi ${employee_name},
Your Monthly Expenses Sheet Approved by Finance Team, and you will receive your amount soon.
Thanks & Regards, Finance Team
Monthly Expenses Approved by Finance Team

Hi ${employee_name},
Your Monthly Expenses Sheet Approved by Finance Team, and you will receive your amount soon.
Thanks & Regards, Finance Team
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Hi ${employee_name},
Your monthly expenses gets rejected. kindly please check your daily expenses and provide the proper information along with proofs.
Thanks & Regards, Finance Team

Hi ${employee_name},
Your monthly expenses gets rejected. kindly please check your daily expenses and provide the proper information along with proofs.
Thanks & Regards, Finance Team
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Your Monthly Expenses Accepted by Manager
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Your Monthly Expenses Accepted by Manager
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Your claim amount released for the month of ${month}-${year}
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Hi ${employee_name},
Your claim amount released for the month of ${month}-${year}. Please check your account for confirmation.
Thanks & Regards, Finance Team
Your claim amount released for the month of ${month}-${year}

Hi ${employee_name},
Your claim amount released for the month of ${month}-${year}. Please check your account for confirmation.
Thanks & Regards, Finance Team
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

wf_activity.name: State Changed to Approved by Finance Team

sys_variable_value.value: state=5^comments=Your Monthly Expenses are clear and approved.^EQ
state=5^comments=Your Monthly Expenses are clear and approved.^EQ

activity.display_value: State Changed to Approved by Finance Team

wf_activity.name: State changed to finance team rejected

sys_variable_value.value: state=6^comments=Sorry, Your claim get rejected. Please provide the full fledged information along with proofs.^EQ
state=6^comments=Sorry, Your claim get rejected. Please provide the full fledged information along with proofs.^EQ

activity.display_value: State changed to finance team rejected
